result.execSummary:
The defendant Juan A. Correa #304037 was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Juan A. Correa #304037 is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Juan A. Correa #304037 was found guilty of Criminal Damage to Property [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse Incident, Repeater], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.01(1).
  • Juan A. Correa #304037 was found guilty of Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse, Repeater], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).
  • Juan A. Correa #304037 was found guilty of Resisting or Obstructing an Officer [Modifiers: Repeater], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.41(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: filed by Atty Mark Lawton

Defendant Juan A. Correa  #304037 in court, in custody with attorney Mark D. Lawton.  Troy D Cross appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Rights/Elements.  Defendant pled no contest to Cts. 2,3, & 4.  Court found guilty.  Judgment was entered.  Ct. 1 dismissed.  Domestic abuse with repeater enhancers dismissed on Counts 2, & 3 repeater enhancers remain , and domestic abuse enhancers remain.  Court sentenced defendant to 2 years in the WI. prison system, consecutive to any other sentence currently serving and to each other, 18 months initial confinement, 6 months extended supervision.  Sentence will be stayed, defendant will be placed on probation for 2 years, consecutive to current sentence he is serving.  Conditions of probation include:  psychological evaluation and comply, maintain absolute sobriety, and costs  Ct. 2 $543.00, Ct. 3 $343.00, and Ct. 4 $243.00.  Defendant is to have no contact with C.S.  Defendant is eligible for the substance abuse program, is not eligible for the challenge incarceration program.
with Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus to Fox Lake Correctional for 9-24-15 at 9:00 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing at 09-24-2015 09:00 am

Defendant Juan A. Correa  #304037 in court, in custody with attorney Mark D. Lawton.  Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Waiver of Preliminary Hearing filed. Court found probable cause, bound defendant over.   Information filed, reading waived. Defendant stood mute. Court entered not guilty plea, jury trial to be set. Twenty days to file motions. Bond continued. Defendant at Fox Lake Correctional.
